Package it.polimi.ingsw.observer

Class ObservableView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.ObservableView
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnyForProdIncSceneController, AnyForProdPaySceneController, AnySceneController, AskCardsForProdSceneController, AskProductionSceneController, AskSlotSceneController, BoardSceneController, ChooseConversionSceneController, ChooseDevCardSceneController, ChooseLeaderToKeep, ChooseLeaderToPlay, ChoosePlayerSceneController, Cli, ExtraDepotSceneController, Gui, GuiManager, InitSceneController, LobbySceneController, LoseSceneController, MarketSceneController, NumPlayerSceneController, PlaceResourcesSceneController, ShowPlayerSceneController, StartSceneController, WinSceneController
public abstract class ObservableView
extends java.lang.Object
Observable class that can be observed by the ObserverView.
